name: Open Cabinet
description: See and search all Orders In Privy Council Office Database

OPENORDERS_FLASK_SECRET.description: A secret key used for signing session cookies. See: http://flask.pocoo.org/docs/0.10/quickstart/#sessions

OPENORDERS_MAIL_SECRET.description: A secret key used to sign data sent to Mailgun. See: https://pythonhosted.org/itsdangerous/#url-safe-serialization

OPENORDERS_MAIL_SALT.description: A salt used for data sent to Mailgun. See: https://pythonhosted.org/itsdangerous/#the-salt

OPENORDERS_FLASK_DEBUG.description: A boolean flag for whether to enable Flask's debug output.
